Text:
I as a bit skeptical of this .torrent because the source is a 1080p BluRay and the download is only a 480p. However, the video quality is pretty good. I did notice a little pixelating but it was not enough to ruin the movie. Additionally, I noticed some audio flaws. I played the movie in different players as well as on the television and the audio skips followed.

Video: 8/10
Audio: 8/10

Thank you uploader
very decent. would recommend the download. great  movie

Hi TvTeam :

Thanks for the upload ! Video + Audio quality is superb - There might be minor glitches but for a movie buff like me this is excellent- enjoy the movie !

Keep it up the good work !
Got a letter from my ISP about this.  And yes, I was using PeerBlocker...
